++ Git Repository


+++ SUMMARY

  * Refers to all files tracked by, and the .git itself inside of the (file system/project) 
    you are source controlling

  * tracks all changes to files, creating a history over time.
  
  * files are added to a repository, and thus through tracking by:
    - GitCommandAddFileToRepositoryVersionControlTracking
    
  * consists of a main GitWorkingTree and zero or more linked GitWorkingTrees.
